question: A quadrilateral may be inscribed in a circle if and only if which of the following is true? W) It is a rectangle X) It is a square Y) It is equilateral Z) Its opposite angles are supplementary
answer: Z) ITS OPPOSITE ANGLES ARE SUPPLEMENTARY
